TopicTitle: I Shall Soar With Angels--glider cinematic

Articles.Content:
"When I die, I shall soar with angels, and when I die to the angels, what I shall become you cannot imagine." -- Jalāl ad-Dīn Muhammad Rūmī

This was inspired by Jatwaa's recent livestream, in which he built a glider powered with BD Armory guns. 

To each their own; I decided it was more Kerbal to use a SRB to launch the glider. 

It certainly is more soothing to the spirit, once the SRB stops belching flame.

Music: "Tempting Secrets" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

Very nice! However, next time I'd recommend changing the game speed to 1/2 when filming to increase FPS, then speeding it back up when editing for an overall increase in framerate. Anyway, keep on making these!

2 hours ago, FCISuperGuy said:

Very nice! However, next time I'd recommend changing the game speed to 1/2 when filming to increase FPS, then speeding it back up when editing for an overall increase in framerate. Anyway, keep on making these!

Thanks for the advice and encouragement! I did experiment with some time warp mods but wasn't quite satisfied with them. Maybe I'll try them again at some point. It would be nice to have smoother-looking video....
